item.title: About Me
item.description:
Welcome to my personal space on the web! ðŸ‘‹ I’m Daniel, and this is where I’ll share a bit about myself, my work, and things I’m learning.

I’m Daniel Dia, a Computer & Communications Engineering (CCE) student at the American University of Beirut (AUB), where I aim to integrate hardware and software approaches, combining my studies with a planned double major in Mathematics and a strong interest in Economics and Finance. ðŸ“ˆ
